privacy.title: Privacy Information
privacy.content: The information you provide will be used solely for reviewing and responding to your report and will be managed in accordance with our

q1.question: Q. How long does it take to respond to a report?
q1.answer: A. Response time varies depending on the content, but we typically review and respond within 1-3 business days.

q2.question: Q. Will the reported party know my identity?
q2.answer: A. No. Reporter information is strictly confidential and will not be disclosed to the reported party.

q3.question: Q. What should I do in an emergency?
q3.answer: A. For urgent matters involving criminal activity or immediate danger to life, please contact the police (911) first.
